scripts.build: tsc && npm run fix-imports && npm run generate-icons && npm run copy-files
scripts.copy-files: mkdir -p dist && cp src/index.html dist/ && cp src/styles.css dist/ && cp -r src/styles dist/ && (cp public/manifest.json dist/ || true) && (cp public/service-worker.js dist/ || true)
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run serve
